items.sentence: Did Tom tell Mary what time she needed to be here tomorrow?
I found something in the box that I didn\'t expect to find.
I haven\'t eaten or drunk anything since yesterday morning.
I don\'t think Tom told Mary the truth about what happened.
What time does Tom think we should get up tomorrow morning?
Tom persuaded the store manager to give him back his money.
Tom put some water into the kettle and put it on the stove.
I take it you don\'t approve of the way Tom\'s been acting.
I don\'t think Tom is as selfish as everybody thinks he is.
I thought about heading over to Tom\'s, but decided not to.
